sub_topic: Determining the treewidth of a graph.
message_1:
What is the treewidth of the graph given below?

```
    A
   / \
  B   C
 / \   \
D   E   F
     \
      G
```

Hint: To determine the treewidth of a graph, find the minimum width of a tree decomposition. The width of a tree decomposition is the size of the largest set of vertices in any bag minus one.
